The history of 4711 Cologne dates back to 1792 when an Italian perfumer created this revolutionary formula in Cologne, Germany. The name "4711" comes from the building's address where it was first produced. During the French occupation of Cologne, all houses were numbered, and the building received the number 4711. Today, this best-selling fragrance continues to be produced according to the original secret formula.

This generous 300ml bottle of 4711 Original is perfect for those who appreciate new interpretations of classic scents. Its versatility makes it an excellent choice for office wear, post-workout refreshment, or as a revitalizing splash during hot summer days. Many fragrance enthusiasts keep a bottle of this timeless cologne in their collection as a staple refresher.

Frequently Asked Question

How should I apply 4711 Original Eau de Cologne for maximum effect?

For the authentic 4711 experience, splash the cologne generously on pulse points (wrists, neck, behind ears) and even on handkerchiefs or clothing. Due to its refreshing nature and lower concentration, luxury cologne like 4711 can be reapplied throughout the day. Many traditionalists also apply it to the temples and forehead for its cooling, revitalizing effect. For a truly invigorating experience, some users keep their bottle in the refrigerator, especially during summer months, to enhance its refreshing properties.
